original_title: Barclay James Harvest: Berlin - A Concert For The People
overview: A l'occasion du trentième anniversaire d'un concert de Barclay James Harvest en plein air à Berlin (Ouest) en 1980.  Berlin - Loving is easy - Mockingbird - Sip of wine - Nova lepidoptera - In memory of the martyrs - Life is for living - Child of the universe - Hymn - Berlin  Bonus : Jonathan - Titles - Moongirl - One night - Beyond the grave
title: Barclay James Harvest: Berlin - A Concert For The People
